name: realtime-message
description: Realtime message system with WebSocket SDK and Server

scripts.build: npm run build -w @realtime-message/shared && npm run build -w @realtime-message/sdk -w @realtime-message/server -w @realtime-message/cloudflare
scripts.test:integration: npm run build:shared && vitest run --config vitest.integration.config.ts
scripts.typecheck: npm run build:shared && npm run typecheck --workspaces --if-present
